question: UFC 300: Alex Pereira vs Jamahal Hill
description:
This is a market group about UFC 300, an upcoming mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that is scheduled to take place on April 13, 2024, at the T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas, Nevada.

This is a market on whether Alex Pereira or Jamahal Hill will win their bout.

If Alex Pereira is declared the winner of this bout, this market will resolve to “Pereira”. If Jamahal Hill is declared the winner of this bout, this market will resolve to “Hill”.

If this fight is declared a draw, or if for any reason the match is not scored, postponed after April 27, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, or cancelled, this market will resolve 50-50.
